Driving Spear.name: Driving Spear
Driving Spear.flavor: You force your foe away with a pointed thrust.
Driving Spear.requirement: You must be wielding a spear.
Driving Spear.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Vital Rend.name: Vital Rend
Vital Rend.flavor: You whirl your polearm around you, attacking all foes within its reach.
Vital Rend.requirement: You must be wielding a spear.
Vital Rend.effect: The target takes ongoing damage equal to 5 + your Intelligence modifier (save ends). Until the ongoing damage ends, each melee or ranged attack that hits the target deals extra damage equal to the ongoing damage.

Whirling Spear.requirement: You must be wielding a spear.
Whirling Spear.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +1 bonus to AC, or a +2 bonus to AC when wielding a spear with two hands.
